sqlMap.select: SELECT goods.name, goods.id as goodsId, goods.sales, gds_property.id as propertyId, gds_property.sale_price as salePrice, gds_pic.pic_url as picUrl FROM t_gds_property gds_property join t_gds_goods goods on goods.id=gds_property.goods_id join t_gds_goods_pic gds_pic on gds_property.id=gds_pic.property_id order by goods.sales desc limit 0,#listSize#

SELECT DISTINCT goods.category_id as categoryId, goods.name, goods.sales, gds_property.id as propertyId, gds_property.sale_price as salePrice, gds_pic.pic_url as picUrl FROM t_gds_property gds_property join t_gds_goods goods on goods.id=gds_property.goods_id join t_gds_goods_pic gds_pic on gds_property.id=gds_pic.property_id where goods.category_id=#categoryId# order by goods.sales desc
limit #offset#, #pageSize#

SELECT count(1) FROM t_gds_property gds_property join t_gds_goods goods on goods.id=gds_property.goods_id join t_gds_goods_pic gds_pic on gds_property.id=gds_pic.property_id where goods.category_id=#categoryId#

select goods.name, goods.id as goodsId, goods.sales, goods.code, goods.detail, goods.status, gds_property.id as propertyId, gds_property.sale_price as salePrice, gds_property.stock, gds_property.property, gds_property.is_discount as isDiscount, gds_property.discount_price as discountPrice FROM t_gds_property gds_property join t_gds_goods goods on goods.id=gds_property.goods_id where gds_property.goods_id=#goodsId#
select gds_pic.property_id as propertyId, gds_pic.pic_url as picUrl from t_gds_goods_pic gds_pic where gds_pic.property_id=#propertyId#

select gds_pic.property_id as propertyId, gds_pic.pic_url as picUrl from t_gds_goods_pic gds_pic where gds_pic.property_id IN
#propertyIds[]#

select goods.name, goods.sales, goods.code, goods.detail, goods.status, gds_property.id as propertyId, gds_property.sale_price as salePrice, gds_property.stock, gds_property.property, gds_property.is_discount as isDiscount, gds_property.discount_price as discountPrice FROM t_gds_property gds_property join t_gds_goods goods on goods.id=gds_property.goods_id where gds_property.id=#propertyId#

select goods.is_delete as isDelete, goods.status, gds_property.stock as stoke, gds_property.id as propertyId, goods.name as goodsName, gds_property.property as goodsProperty FROM t_gds_property gds_property join t_gds_goods goods on goods.id=gds_property.goods_id where gds_property.id=#propertyId#
sqlMap.update: update t_gds_property set stock=stock-#stoke# where id=#propertyId#
update t_gds_goods set sales=#stoke#+sales where id=#goodsId#
sqlMap.select: SELECT max(gds_property.id) AS propertyId FROM t_gds_property gds_property left JOIN t_gds_goods goods ON goods.id = gds_property.goods_id where goods.name like concat("%",#goodsName#,"%") GROUP BY goods.id limit 0, 10

#propertyIds[]#
SELECT tag.id, tag.tag tag.sort_num as sortNum FROM t_gds_hot_tag tag order by tag.sort_num asc limit 0, 10

SELECT gg.id AS id, gg.code AS code, gg.name AS name, gg.sales AS sales, gg.detail AS detail, gg.status AS status, gc.name AS categoryName, gp.stock AS stock, gp.discount_price AS discountPrice, gp.sale_price AS salePrice, gp.is_discount AS isDiscount, pic.pic_url AS picUrl FROM t_gds_goods gg, t_gds_goods_pic pic, t_gds_property gp, t_gds_category gc
WHERE gg.id = gp.goods_id AND gg.category_id = gc.id AND gp.id = pic.property_id AND gg.is_delete = 0 ORDER BY gg.id ASC
limit #offset#, #pageSize#
sqlMap.insert:
INSERT INTO t_gds_goods (code, name, category_id, sales, detail, status, is_delete, create_emp, modify_emp) VALUES (#code#, #name#, #categoryId#, #sales#, #detail#, #status#, #isDelete#, #createEmp#, #modifyEmp#)
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID() as id;
sqlMap.update: UPDATE t_gds_goods SET code=#code#, name=#name#, category_id=#categoryId#, sales=#sales#, detail=#detail#, status=#status#, is_delete=#isDelete#, create_emp=#createEmp#, modify_emp=#modifyEmp# WHERE id = #id#
UPDATE t_gds_goods SET is_delete=1 WHERE id = #id#
